name: That's Bananas
description:
Dodge around the bouncing weapons, and try not to get sliced while trying to get a high score.

Gain points by staying close enough to the weapons but not getting sliced up.

Move around Bananie with the onscreen joystick OR enable Move To Finger in the settings menu to move around Bananie by clicking on a position or dragging around your mouse, and try not to be sliced up.
